About Me

I'm a graphic designer who works with businesses in Corpus Christi, TX to improve their visual communication and digital outreach. I work with my clients on branding, promotional, and in-house materials, digital marketing campaigns, and website design.

I am also a proud member of the collaborative marketing cooperative, Hi-Res Media Group, alongside expert creatives in a variety of associated areas. This partnership grants me the opportunity to provide my clients with services such as photography, videography, advertising campaign management, content marketing, and software and app design.

I've partnered with some of Corpus Christi's finest businesses, including:

 

  • Water Street Oyster Bar
  • Gill Landscape Nursery
  • WKMC Architects
  • Harbor Playhouse
  • Executive Surf Club
  • Art Museum of South Texas
  • Concrete Street Amphitheater
  • Sterling Personnel
  • Ironwood Finance
  • Industrial Fabricators Corpus Christi
  • Corpus Christi Symphony Orchestra
